node.html: As my portfolio v1 was getting a bit outdated, I decided to update it and built a new version using React and a template from Brittany I found on Github.

Built a personal portfolio from scratch to showcase my projects, document my skills and write a little about myself.

Worked on and helped built this platform. I also worked with content managment and research.
